tool_description: get the latest news in the world of business market
name: business news daily
title: business news daily

api_list.name: Get all business news
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all the current business market news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://business-news-daily.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "business-news-daily.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://business-news-daily.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "business-news-daily.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
